favourite.article: The Lord chose you to be a part "Of His great plan, His work of art. What wonder! What a privilege! To satisfy His yearning to share all He is— Divine, unsearchable riches!" Thank You Lord for choosing us to satisfy Your yearning to share all that You are! Strengthen us to constantly open to You to receive Your dispensing, Amen!

Looking away unto Jesus, the Author and Perfecter of our faith, who FOR THE JOY SET BEFORE HIM endured the cross, despising the shame, and has sat down on the right hand of the throne of God. Hebrews 12:2
I want to be His bride!!!! To be the joy in His heart!!Amen He chose each one of us!! We need to let Him in us!!
I love this song - What a blessing to just recently discover it. It was for her, the Church, His Bride. AMEN!
Let's enjoy and enter in to all He is! Then we'll begin to understand the feeling in His heart toward us. What love that motivated Him! Oh to come to us despite our sin! Lord thank You for Your love!

It was for her! Hallelujah for His masterpiece, His counterpart :-) This hymn has been really touching me recently. I am so thankful to the Lord that He came to us despite our sin. Lord, be so real to us today. Thank you that it was for her, the Church - Your Bride!
Oh Lord Jesus!! Thank You for Your Unsearchable Riches.Your All Inclusiveness!! You give Everything to the Church. Thank You for loving us..
Oh Lord may I open more of myself to You every day to let You in to every part!!
I like this song.
I really want to know

I was remembering this song, and I realized that to fall in love with the Lord is to fall in love with the Church! and to know our God is also to know the Church! Lord Jesus, give us a vision concerning You and the Church! May this vision reign over us everyday, and by this vision we can be able to buil up Your dwelling place. Hallelujah!
Yes! I want to know my God!
Hallelujah! Amen! How wonderful! How marvelous! He sold all He had for Her! Oh Lord Jesus! This song never fails to touch me. He gave everything For Her the Church!
What was the joy set before Him? It was for her, the church, His Bride.
Praise the Lord for His unconditional love toward us, His bride. <3 <3 <3
Praise the Lord for the church!!

This song so romantic and touching. He gives all He has for her, the church. Wonderful to see His whole idea and plan is just for us, His Body, His masterpiece, His counterpart. Can we look down on ourselves? The King has done the best, what should we do??? Prepare His coming. Glorify our Lord.

Eph 5:25 Husbands, love your wives even as Christ also loved the church and gave Himself up for her 26 That He might sanctify her ,cleansing her by the washing of the water in the word, 27 That He might present the church to Himself glorious,not having spot or wrinkle or any such things but that she would be holy and without blemish. Praise the Lord for the masterpiece and glorious counterpart ! We love our Lord and His church!

This hymn always remind me of how precious the church is to Him. The church is His counterpart, His bride, His masterpiece....that we need to love the church as He does. The Lord even died for the church. This song always touched me every time I listen to it, and I have never get bored of how meaningful and precious the church is. I really love this song...Amen.
Thank You LORD for such love the highest love ever I know... really touch me to love "YOU" love the "CHURCH" (Your bride, Your masterpiece...).

This hymn brings me out of myself, my circumstances & my self absorption as I realise what love He has, what selflessness, what need. God has a deep desire and I, along with all of His blessed saints can satisfy that need just by opening to Him. Oh Lord, the tears flow, I love You, I love You. Have Your way in us... Bless you all.

"Why did He go and sell all that He had?" It was for her, willingly, He died. It was for her, the church. It was for me, for you, for us.
Thank You, my Lord, it was for me.
Really enjoyed the song. Appreciated reading the other comments. The Body is such a diverse wonderful family. Can't wait to meet you all. Christ is all that matters.

Thanks to the Lord for He is so prevailing. His desire is for the church, He willingly died for us to become His fullness and expression. How we need to stay in the flow for the building up of the church. Hallelujah.
Hallelujah today we are in God's building. We are part of His great plan to fulfill His eternal plan which is to produce the church as His masterpiece, His poem, His eternal habitation.

Wow, the words perfectly match the yearning and longing in my heart to know Him, and to know how He feels about me. Oh, the wonder that He chose me to be a part of His plan. His multifarious wisdom is beginning to be seen in the church! Thank the Lord for inspiring the sister and giving her the words to express it. It is truly food to nourish my entire tripartite being. Glory to God! Yes, Lord, do continue to reveal Yourself to "whosoever will," and thank You for making Yourself so available to us!

I love this song. It reminds me how I need to open and come to Him because He chose me to be a part of His plan. Thank You Lord for Your love that You did everything for us to gain the church which is Your bride, Your counterpart. Oh Lord continue to reveal to us so that we may know You more.
Amen "we" are the Church...We altogether. Praise Him!!
The best song ever!!!!!

I am deeply touched by this song. God's desire is for the church, "US", His Bride, His Body. It was for her the church-His Bride. It was for her willingly He died. She is the joy deep in His heart, His masterpiece, His counterpart. Lord Jesus we love You.
Praise the Lord that we are His church. The church is not a building but US!! Praise the Lord.
We are not only for the church but even we are the church. Amen.

Wow, what a wonderful, rich, and expressive song that really shows the Lord's love for us. How can we not love our Lord after reading these words? Thank You Lord You did so much and gave up so much for us, Your bride, the church. May many be gained for Your purpose after reading this song.
This song is so sweet and precious! "Don't you want to know your God? what's hidden in His heart for You." Oh Lord make us know You more!
His Bride is what is on His heart! May we be fully given for what concerns Him!! Lord, we love Your Body, Your Bride, the church!! Hallelujah we are part of it!
Before I only thought that Christ is for individual believers. Now, I am realizing that the church is so precious in His heart. Let us just go on more and more to Him personally to build up His Body.
Praise the Lord for His church! May we all have an appreciation and a love for the church as He does! We are for the church :)
I am touched with the song. Deep inside me my heart leap with joy upon hearing this song.

Here, in one of the local churches in Metro Manila, Philippines, our YP already learned this last October 2010 Sembreak Conference. They surely fell in love with Christ and the church. Such a love from the LORD that HE gave Himself up FOR HER. It would be better that young people of this age would see and realized this rather than fall in love with the things of the world.
Praise the Lord!
